MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Williamwood Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:50pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to restore power to the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:05pm on Saturday, 27 March 2021
